pages.text: $(d)Candlemaker$() is a type of villager profession. These villagers are attracted to Wax Melters.

pages.title: Candlemakers
pages.text: $(d)Candlemakers$() can be found in Villages as well as in Candle Making Huts. This type of Villager has trades available to speed up the process of making candles, and unlocks a lot of alternate routes to make candles with.
